DPD NasDem Uji Bakal Calon Wali Kota Medan, Tak Ada Bobby Nasution
05 Nov 2019, 12:07 by Ferdinan
Medan - DPD NasDem Kota Medan mulai menyeleksi para pendaftar bakal calon Wali Kota dan Wakil Wali Kota Medan untuk Pilkada 2020. Menantu Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi), Bobby Nasution, tidak ikut.
"Bobby Nasution tidak ikut, belum mengembalikan (formulir pendaftaran) sampai sekarang," kata Ketua DPD NasDem Medan Afif Abdillah saat dihubungi, Selasa (5/11/2019).
Para pendaftar bakal calon walkot-wakil walkot Medan hari ini memaparkan visi-misinya. Pengurus NasDem akan mendalami visi-misi, termasuk program kerja yang diusung para pendaftar di laga Pilwakot Medan.
"Kami ingin mengetahui apakah yang bersangkutan mengerti permasalahan Kota Medan dan apa solusinya. Kami menggali apa benar mengerti permasalahan, atau hanya mengerti permasalahan tapi solusi belum tergambar," tutur Afif.
Kembali ke soal Bobby, NasDem, menurut Afif, masih membuka pintu. Sebab penjaringan bakal calon Walkot-Wakil Walkot Medan akan diteruskan ke DPW NasDem Sumut hingga DPP.
"Dari penjaringan ini (DPD Kota Medan), kita cari 3 walkot, 3 wakil walkot, tapi tidak bisa dipastikan juga jumlahnya. Bisa saja provinsi (DPW Sumut) menambahkan, tapi kita diarahkan tidak terburu-buru karena kita mencari yang terbaik," tegas Afif.
Para pendaftar bakal calon Wali Kota Medan di DPD NasDem, yakni Kolonel CKU H Syaiful Azhar, Maruli Siahaan, Akhyar Nasution, Ihwan Ritonga. Pemaparan visi-misi ini digelar tertutup di Garuda Plaza Hotel, Jl Sisingamangaraja, Medan Kota.
"Kecuali Pak Akhyar, semua konfirmasi hadir," katanya.

NasDem DPD Will Test Candidates for Medan Mayor, No Bobby Nasution
05 Nov 2019, 12:07 by Ferdinand
Medan - DPD NasDem Medan City began selecting applicants for candidates for mayor and deputy mayor of Medan for the 2020 elections. President Joko Widodo's son-in-law, Bobby Nasution, did not participate.
"Bobby Nasution has not participated, he has not returned (the registration form) until now," Medan DPD NasDem Chairman Afif Abdillah said when contacted on Tuesday (11/05/2019).
Applicants of prospective walkot representatives from Medan walkot today explained their visions. NasDem administrators will explore the vision and mission, including the work program carried by the registrants in the Medan Pilwakot match.
"We want to find out whether the parties concerned understand the problems of the City of Medan and what the solutions are. We are exploring whether we really understand the problem, or only understand the problem but the solution has not been drawn," Afif said.
Back to the matter of Bobby, NasDem, according to Afif, still opened the door. Because the selection of prospective Walkot-Medan Walkot Representatives will be forwarded to the North Sumatra DPD NasDem to the DPP.
"From this selection (DPD Medan City), we are looking for 3 walkot, 3 deputy walkot, but we cannot be sure of the number. The province (North Sumatra DPW) may add, but we are directed not to be in a hurry because we are looking for the best," stressed Afif.
The applicants will be candidates for Medan Mayor in NasDem DPD, namely Colonel CKU H Syaiful Azhar, Maruli Siahaan, Akhyar Nasution, Ihwan Ritonga. The vision-mission presentation was held closed at the Garuda Plaza Hotel, Jl Sisingamangaraja, Medan Kota.
"Except for Pak Akhyar, all confirmations are present," he said.
